questions.question: What is the dominant color of the main body of the handbag?
What is the color of the handbag's handles and accents?
What is the primary material used in the construction of the bag?
Describe the overall shape of the handbag as seen from the front?
What decorative design element is prominently featured on the bag's front?
What is the style of the handbag's handles based on their attachment?
What is the texture of the handbag's material; smooth or embossed?
How many butterflies are depicted on the handbag's front panel?
What small detail is attached to the bag's front, below the butterflies?
What is the shape of the individual decorative butterflies on the bag?
Considering the handle attachment, what type of bag is it, tote or satchel?
What is the apparent depth or width of the handbag in inches, shown in the image?
From the side view, does the bag appear structured or slouchy?
Is there any visible visible stitching present on the visible seams of the bag?
Does the bag seem to be designed for casual or formal occasions based on its style?
